pages.text: Though somewhat hard to find, cats have been important companions to witches for

ages.$(2br)They are powerfully steeped in magic, some saying their reflective eyes can see the dead.$(2br)Wild cats can be found in the jungle and lured with raw fish, but be warned: $(1)they are highly skittish and independent$().$(2br)It should come as no surprise that, as the most traditional familiar, cats have a powerful effect on a witches' magic. In
particular, $(thing)rituals$() and curses are much stronger.$(2br)$(o)Not quite nine lives.
